name: The Childhood Fear - CHAPTER ONE
description:
The childhood fear was created to be a sequence of 7 different games in the horror style of the 90's with a theme of puzzle and psychological terror, Chapter 1 is summarized in the story of a teenager named BILLY who went to spend the weekend at his uncle's house JOE to take care of him, because Uncle Joe was very strange and his family was going to travel and didn't want to leave him alone. Billy on the first night in the house notices some strange things and decides to investigate and then billy starts to discover things...

*THE SECOND FLOOR OF THE HOUSE IS NOT AVAILABLE IN THE DEMO BUT WE ARE ALREADY IMPLEMENTING IT IN THE MAIN GAME*

SUPPORT THE DEVELOPER
This demo is a way to introduce the game and also serves as a way for the community to report bugs!

But our main purpose is to put all our games on STEAM to increase visibility, if you want to help us with a donation before downloading the DEMO file it will help us a lot!

BUGS & REPORTS:
Please, if you find any bugs in the demo, report them in the comments.
